full_text:
--- Page 1 ---

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
December
 
14th,
 
2025
 
 
University
 
of
 
Notr e
 
Dame
 
Graduate
 
School,
 
University
 
of
 
Notre
 
Dame,
 
Notre
 
Dame,
 
Indiana
 
46556,
 
USA.
 
Sir/
 
Ma’am
 
LETTER
 
OF
 
RECOMMENDA TION
 
FOR
 
NKWOR
 
JANE
 
CHINELO
 
I
 
am
 
writing
 
to
 
provide
 
my
 
strongest
 
recommendation
 
for
 
Nkwor
 
Jane
 
Chinelo
 
for
 
admission
 
to
 
your
 
doctoral
 
program.
 
As
 
her
 
former
 
postgraduate
 
coordinator
 
during
 
her
 
Master's
 
program
 
at
 
Covenant
 
University ,
 
mentor ,
 
and
 
co-author
 
on
 
her
 
primary
 
research
 
publication,
 
I
 
have
 
had
 
the
 
opportunity
 
to
 
observe
 
Jane's
 
academic
 
development,
 
leadership
 
qualities,
 
and
 
research
 
potential,
 
which
 
I
 
believe
 
will
 
inspire
 
confidence
 
in
 
her
 
ability
 
to
 
make
 
meaningful
 
contributions
 
to
 
your
 
program.
 
In
 
Jane's
 
first
 
semester ,
 
I
 
observed
 
her
 
natural
 
leadership
 
abilities
 
when
 
she
 
volunteered
 
to
 
serve
 
as
 
postgraduate
 
course
 
representative.
 
Despite
 
being
 
new
 
to
 
the
 
program,
 
she
 
effectively
 
communicated
 
student
 
concerns
 
during
 
our
 
meetings
 
and
 
helped
 
resolve
 
scheduling
 
conflicts
 
for
 
core
 
courses.
 
Her
 
performance
 
in
 
the
 
university’ s
 
debate
 
competition,
 
where
 
she
 
argued
 
in
 
two
 
contests,
 
demonstrated
 
both
 
her
 
communication
 
skills
 
and
 
her
 
ability
 
to
 
articulate
 
complex
 
technical
 
concepts
 
to
 
diverse
 
audiences.
 
Jane
 
also
 
contributed
 
to
 
our
 
department's
 
collaborative
 
environment
 
by
 
assisting
 
newer
 
students
 
who
 
had
 
challenges
 
adapting
 
to
 
the
 
department’ s
 
work,
 
even
 
during
 
her
 
field
 
research.
 
While
 
I
 
was
 
not
 
Jane's
 
direct
 
dissertation
 
supervisor ,
 
I
 
monitored
 
her
 
research
 
progress
 
through
 
our
 
department's
 
research
 
seminars
 
and
 
reports.
 
Jane
 
demonstrated
 
strong
 
problem-solving
 
skills
 
by
 
independently
 
exploring
 
solutions
 
to
 
challenges
 
with
 
reward
 
structures
 
in
 
her
 
experiments.
 
Her
 
proactive
 
approach,
 
including
 
a
 
literature
 
review
 
and
 
exploration
 
of
 
techniques
 
such
 
as
 
Prioritised
 
Experience
 
Replay ,
 
demonstrates
 
her
 
capacity
 
for
 
independent
 
research,
 
which
 
is
 
essential
 
for
 
doctoral
 
studies.
 
 
What
 
particularly
 
impressed
 
me
 
was
 
Jane's
 
response
 
to
 
her
 
first
 
semester
 
results.
 
Dissatisfied
 
with
 
her
 
initial
 
grades,
 
she
 
demonstrated
 
remarkable
 
determination
 
and
 
work
 
ethic,
 
resulting
 
 

--- Page 2 ---

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
in
 
a
 
significant
 
improvement
 
in
 
her
 
second-semester
 
performance
 
that
 
placed
 
her
 
among
 
the
 
top
 
of
 
her
 
class.
 
Throughout
 
the
 
program,
 
Jane's
 
technical
 
presentations
 
in
 
our
 
departmental
 
seminars
 
showed
 
consistent
 
improvement
 
in
 
both
 
depth
 
and
 
clarity .
 
Her
 
final
 
dissertation
 
presentation
 
demonstrated
 
her
 
mastery
 
of
 
complex
 
reinforcement
 
learning
 
concepts
 
and
 
her
 
ability
 
to
 
implement
 
sophisticated
 
neural
 
network
 
architectures,
 
as
 
even
 
the
 
external
 
supervisor
 
was
 
impressed
 
with
 
her
 
work.
 
 
During
 
our
 
informal
 
discussions,
 
Jane
 
demonstrated
 
strong
 
analytical
 
thinking
 
when
 
explaining
 
her
 
comparative
 
analysis
 
methodology .
 
Her
 
ability
 
to
 
articulate
 
the
 
limitations
 
of
 
traditional
 
algorithms
 
and
 
justify
 
her
 
choice
 
of
 
benchmarking
 
approaches
 
reflected
 
mature
 
research
 
reasoning
 
for
 
a
 
Master's
 
student.
 
Her
 
remarkable
 
determination
 
was
 
evident
 
when
 
her
 
first-semester
 
results
 
did
 
not
 
meet
 
her
 
expectations;
 
her
 
subsequent
 
improvements
 
demonstrated
 
her
 
resilience
 
and
 
commitment
 
towards
 
excellence.
 
In
 
my
 
role
 
as
 
coordinator ,
 
I
 
observed
 
Jane's
 
consistent
 
professionalism,
 
her
 
ability
 
to
 
meet
 
deadlines
 
even
 
during
 
challenging
 
coursework
 
periods,
 
and
 
her
 
respectful
 
engagement
 
with
 
both
 
faculty
 
and
 
peers.
 
Her
 
intellectual
 
curiosity
 
and
 
maturity
 
were
 
evident
 
in
 
her
 
attendance
 
at
 
research
 
seminars
 
outside
 
her
 
direct
 
area
 
and
 
her
 
thoughtful
 
questions
 
during
 
visiting
 
lecturer
 
presentations,
 
which
 
will
 
serve
 
her
 
well
 
in
 
doctoral
 
studies.
 
Jane's
 
progression
 
from
 
an
 
enthusiastic
 
but
 
inexperienced
 
graduate
 
student
 
to
 
a
 
confident
 
researcher
 
capable
 
of
 
independent
 
work
 
demonstrates
 
the
 
qualities
 
essential
 
for
 
doctoral
 
success.
 
Based
 
on
 
my
 
observations
 
of
 
Jane's
 
academic
 
performance,
 
research
 
development,
 
and
 
professional
 
maturity
 
during
 
her
 
Master's
 
program,
 
I
 
am
 
confident
 
she
 
possesses
 
the
 
intellectual
 
capacity ,
 
resilience,
 
and
 
dedication
 
necessary
 
for
 
doctoral
 
success.
 
Her
 
combination
 
of
 
technical
 
competence,
 
research
 
independence,
 
and
 
leadership
 
potential
 
makes
 
her
 
exceptionally
 
well-suited
 
for
 
advanced
 
research
 
in
 
AI
 
and
 
computer
 
engineering.
 
I
 
wholeheartedly
 
recommend
 
Jane
 
for
 
admission
 
to
 
the
 
doctoral
 
program
 
at
 
the
 
University
 
of
 
Notre
 
Dame
 
without
 
reservation.
 
Yours
 
Faithfully,
 
Kennedy
 
Okokpujie
 
(PhD,
 
M.Eng.,
 
MBA,
 
M.Sc.,
 
B.Eng.,
 
SMIEE)
 
Covenant
 
University,
 
Ota,
 
Nigeria.
 
 
Email:
 
kennedy.okokpujie@covenantuniversity.edu.ng
 
GSM
 
DL:
 
+2348161115367
